item.description: A little light work: raking leaves from waterbars and ditches on the lowest mile of trail. Sawyer will cut fallen trees to 6' lengths. If enough crew, we tote them up to jobsite and replace old ones, otherwise that's for later in the season. Nice relaxed pace among new leaves and Spring flowers. Too early for trillium? We'll see. Finish by 4 PM, or leave when you must, with our thanks.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: West Ridge Trail, Mt Cardigan
